price: To, idan kun karkace daga bayan hujjõji bayyanannu sun zo muku to ku sani cẽwa lalle ne Allah, Mabuwãyi ne, Mai hikima.
arabic: فَإِن زَلَلۡتُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡكُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-in zalaltum min baʿdi mā jāatkumu al-bayinātu fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
